hero.title: Configuration made easy
hero.subtitle: Secure secrets, zero headaches, and configs that actually work across all your environments.
hero.lead: Built by devs who've been there.

features.title: What if config management was actually... pleasant?
features.subtitle: Secure by default, simple to use, and designed by developers who understand your pain.

security.title: Secure secrets
security.description: Encrypted at rest, in transit, and in your dreams. Your secrets are actually secret.

environments.title: Environments
environments.description: Dev, staging, prod - all in sync. No more "works on my machine" moments.

integration.title: Developer First
integration.description: CLI tools, Git integration, and APIs that don't make you want to cry.

audit.title: Audit Everything
audit.description: Who changed what, when, and why. Perfect for those compliance conversations.

contact.title: Got questions? We've got answers.
contact.subtitle: Whether it's a technical question, feature request, or you just want to vent about config management - we're here for it.

direct.title: Prefer email?
direct.instructions: Shoot us a message at <link></link>. We usually respond within a few hours (unless we're debugging our own config issues 😅)

beta.question: When will the beta end?
beta.answer: We're aiming for Q4 2025, but honestly, it depends on feedback and how many bugs you help us squash.

pricing.question: What about pricing after beta?
pricing.answer: We're thinking developer-friendly pricing. Think GitHub/Vercel model, not enterprise nightmare pricing.

config-migration.question: Can I migrate my existing configs?
config-migration.answer: Absolutely. We have migration tools and can help you move from any existing setup.

signup.title: Ready to escape config hell?
signup.subtitle: Join the beta and help us build the config server you actually want to use. Early access is free, feedback is priceless.
signup.footer: No credit card required. No BS. Just better config management.

email.label: Email address
email.help: We will use this to send you important stuff — like password resets, not cat memes. Promise.

confirmation.label: Enter confirmation code
confirmation.description: We have sent you a confirmation code to your new email address, please paste it here to confirm your email address change.

name.label: Display name
name.help: This is how others will see you around the app. Keep it cool — or weird, we don’t judge.

delete.label: Delete account
delete.help: This will nuke your account and all your data—no going back. Only do this if you're 100% sure. Seriously.

confirmation.title: Are you sure?
confirmation.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.
confirmation.cancel: Nope, I have changed my mind

contact.title: Drop us a line
contact.subtitle: Whether it's a technical question, feature request, or you just want to vent about config management, we're here for it.

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us about your config nightmares, feature ideas, or just say hi...

success.title: We've got your message!
success.detail: Thanks for getting in touch! We'll review your submission and connect with you as soon as possible.
